attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon's attacks do 30 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Beloved Pulse
attacks.text: If you played a TAG TEAM Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Ultimate Ray
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck. M+ Altered Creation-GX For the rest of this game, your Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Water Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), when your opponent's Active Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from those attacks, take 1 more Prize card. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Fabled Flarebolts
attacks.text: Discard up to 3 in any combination of basic Fire and basic Lightning Energy cards from your Benched Pokémon. This attack does 90 damage for each card you discarded in this way. RRLL+ Cross Break-GX This attack does 170 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. If you played N's Resolve from your hand during this turn, this attack also does 170 damage to 1 of your opponent's other Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Violent Appetite
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Pokémon from your hand. If you do, heal 60 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Jet Pierce
attacks.text: C+ Chaotic Order-GX Turn all of your Prize cards face up. (Those Prize cards remain face up for the rest of the game.) If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Psychic Energy and 1 extra Darkness Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), take 2 Prize cards. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Dragon Arcana
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has 2 or more different types of basic Energy attached to it, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Raging Claws
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Fighter's Roar
abilities.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX, this Pokémon can evolve during the turn you play it.

attacks.name: Shout of Power
attacks.text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scaly Uppercut
attacks.text: You may discard a Pokémon Tool card from this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 90 more damage.

abilities.name: Ultra Burst
abilities.text: This Pokémon can't attack unless your opponent has 2 or fewer Prize cards remaining.

attacks.name: Luster of Downfall
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Jumping Balloon
attacks.text: This attack does 60 more damage for each of your opponent's Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX in play. C+ Puffy Smashers-GX Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep. If this Pokémon has at least 4 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 200 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Lead
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Follow My Tail
attacks.text: Search your deck for any number of Eevee and Eevee-GX and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

abilities.name: Sleepy Voice
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

abilities.name: Scampering Tail
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put the top card of your opponent's deck on the bottom of their deck without looking at it.

attacks.name: Nice-Nice Catch
attacks.text: Draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Bye-Bye Throw
attacks.text: Discard up to 2 cards from your hand. This attack does 60 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Heavy Hold
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Brutal Edge
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Work Up
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's attacks do 60 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Arf Arf Bark
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon. If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, you may discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Aero Fall
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tail Whip
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Parabolic Counter
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Lightning Pokémon in play, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Continuous Tumble
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Carry and Run
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost is ColorlessColorless less.

attacks.name: Lariat
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Air Slash
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Disk Reload
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Brave Buddies
attacks.text: If you played a Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Silver Knight-GX
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Ultra Beast, it is Knocked Out. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Beastite
rules: The attacks of the Ultra Beast this card is attached to do 10 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon for each Prize card you have taken (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Bellelba & Brycen
rules: Discard 3 cards from the top of each player's deck.When you play this card, you may discard 3 other cards from your hand. If you do, each player discards their Benched Pokémon until they have 3 Benched Pokémon. Your opponent discards first.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Chaotic Swell
rules: Whenever either player plays a Stadium card from their hand, discard that Stadium card after discarding this one. (The new Stadium card has no effect.)
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Clay
rules: Discard the top 7 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Item cards, put them into your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Cynthia & Caitlin
rules: Put a Supporter card from your discard pile into your hand. You can't choose Cynthia & Caitlin or a card you discarded with the effect of this card.When you play this card, you may discard another card from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Erika
rules: Each player may draw up to 3 cards. You draw first.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Great Catcher
rules: You can play this card only if you discard 2 other cards from your hand.Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX with their Active Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Guzma & Hala
rules: Search your deck for a Stadium card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.When you play this card, you may discard 2 other cards from your hand. If you do, you may also search for a Pokémon Tool card and a Special Energy card in this way.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Island Challenge Amulet
rules: The Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX this card is attached to gets -100 HP, and when it is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, that player takes 1 fewer Prize card.

name: Lana's Fishing Rod
rules: Shuffle a Pokémon and a Pokémon Tool card from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Lillie's Full Force
rules: Draw 4 cards.At the end of this turn, if you have 3 or more cards in your hand, shuffle cards from your hand into your deck until you have 2 cards in your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Lillie's Poké Doll
rules: You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Mallow & Lana
rules: Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.When you play this card, you may discard 2 other cards from your hand. If you do, heal 120 damage from the Pokémon you moved to your Bench.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Misty & Lorelei
rules: Search your deck for up to 3 Water Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.When you play this card, you may discard 5 other cards from your hand. If you do, during this turn, your Water Pokémon can use their GX attacks even if you have used your GX attack.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: N's Resolve
rules: Discard the top 6 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are basic Energy cards, attach them to 1 of your Benched Dragon Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Professor Oak's Setup
rules: Search your deck for up to 3 Basic Pokémon of different types and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Red & Blue
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Roller Skater
rules: Discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards. If you discarded an Energy card in this way, draw 2 more cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Rosa
rules: You can play this card only if 1 of your Pokémon was Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn.Search your deck for a Pokémon, a Trainer card, and a basic Energy card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Roxie
rules: Discard up to 2 Pokémon that aren't Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX from your hand. Draw 3 cards for each card you discarded in this way.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Tag Call
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 TAG TEAM cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Unidentified Fossil
rules: Play this card as if it were a 60-HP Colorless Basic Pokémon. At any time during your turn (before your attack), you may discard this card from play.This card can't retreat.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Will
rules: The next time you flip any number of coins for the effect of an attack, Ability, or Trainer card this turn, choose heads or tails for the first coin flip.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Draw Energy
rules: This card provides Colorless Energy.When you attach this card from your hand to a Pokémon, draw a card.

abilities.name: Shining Vine
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, when you attach a Grass Energy card from your hand to it, you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Forest Dump
attacks.text: CCC+ Solar Plant-GX This attack does 50 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), heal all damage from all of your Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Fragrant Flower Garden
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 30 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Allergic Explosion-GX
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned, Paralyzed, and Poisoned. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Brilliant Flare
attacks.text: You may search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. R+ Crimson Flame Pillar-GX Attach 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned and Confused. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Flaming Shot
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Fire Energy card from your hand. If you do, put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Backfire
attacks.text: Put 2 Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon into your hand.

attacks.name: Massive Heat Wave-GX
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from each of your opponent's Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Splash Maker
attacks.text: You may attach up to 3 Water Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like. If you do, heal 50 damage from those Pokémon for each card you attached to them in this way. WWC+ Bubble Launcher-GX 100+ Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra Water Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 150 more damage. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Splash Maker
attacks.text: You may attach up to 3 Water Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like. If you do, heal 50 damage from those Pokémon for each card you attached to them in this way. WWC+ Bubble Launcher-GX 100+ Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra Water Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 150 more damage. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Cosmic Burn
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Cosmic Burn during your next turn. PPC+ Light of the Protector-GX 200 If you played Lillie's Full Force from your hand during this turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to each of your Pokémon during your opponent's next turn. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Dance of Tribute
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, you may draw 3 cards. You can't use more than 1 Dance of Tribute Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Strafe-GX
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Dusty Defense
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, all of your Pokémon take 30 less damage from your opponent's attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Desert Hurricane
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 120 more damage. Then, discard that Stadium card.

attacks.name: Sonic Edge-GX
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Smug Face
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon by your opponent's TAG TEAM Pokémon and Ultra Beasts, and by your opponent's Pokémon that have any Special Energy attached to them.

attacks.name: Stalking Claws-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on that Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Fire Fling
attacks.text: Put 4 Fire Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Kindle
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Nasty Plot
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Bubble Hold
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon, it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

abilities.name: Scatter
abilities.text: At the end of your opponent's turn, if this Pokémon has any damage counters on it, flip a coin. If tails, shuffle this Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your deck.

attacks.name: Nuzzle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Volt Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Mirror Shot
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn't happen.

abilities.name: Blow-Away Bomb
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you discard this Pokémon with the effect of Roxie, you may put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Place damage counters after the effect of Roxie.)

attacks.name: Poison Gas
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

abilities.name: Double Type
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is in play, it is Psychic and Fighting type.

attacks.name: Power Cyclone
attacks.text: Move an Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Impersonation
attacks.text: Discard a Supporter card from your hand. If you do, use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack.

attacks.name: Mischievous Hands
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Pokémon and put 2 damage counters on each of them.

attacks.name: Eleventh Hour Tackle
attacks.text: If there are 3 or fewer cards in your deck, this attack does 150 more damage.

attacks.name: Drill Bazooka
attacks.text: Discard the top 4 cards of your deck.

attacks.name: Thumping Fall

attacks.name: Ultimate Ray
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck. M+ Altered Creation-GX For the rest of this game, your Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Water Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), when your opponent's Active Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from those attacks, take 1 more Prize card. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Fabled Flarebolts
attacks.text: Discard up to 3 in any combination of basic Fire and basic Lightning Energy cards from your Benched Pokémon. This attack does 90 damage for each card you discarded in this way. RRLL+ Cross Break-GX This attack does 170 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. If you played N's Resolve from your hand during this turn, this attack also does 170 damage to 1 of your opponent's other Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Violent Appetite
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Pokémon from your hand. If you do, heal 60 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Jet Pierce
attacks.text: C+ Chaotic Order-GX Turn all of your Prize cards face up. (Those Prize cards remain face up for the rest of the game.) If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Psychic Energy and 1 extra Darkness Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), take 2 Prize cards. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Jumping Balloon
attacks.text: This attack does 60 more damage for each of your opponent's Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX in play. C+ Puffy Smashers-GX Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep. If this Pokémon has at least 4 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 200 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Disk Reload
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Brave Buddies
attacks.text: If you played a Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Silver Knight-GX
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Ultra Beast, it is Knocked Out. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Giant Hearth
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may discard a card from their hand. If they do, that player searches their deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards, reveals them, and puts them into their hand. Then, that player shuffles their deck.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Great Catcher
rules: You can play this card only if you discard 2 other cards from your hand.Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX with their Active Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Island Challenge Amulet
rules: The Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX this card is attached to gets -100 HP, and when it is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, that player takes 1 fewer Prize card.

name: Lana's Fishing Rod
rules: Shuffle a Pokémon and a Pokémon Tool card from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Lillie's Poké Doll
rules: You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Martial Arts Dojo
rules: You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Power Plant
rules: Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX in play (both yours and your opponent's) have no Abilities.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Tag Call
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 TAG TEAM cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Draw Energy
rules: This card provides Colorless Energy.When you attach this card from your hand to a Pokémon, draw a card.
